page.title: 06Dale Electric,Gristhorpe.
page.content: Dale Electric was founded in 1935 by Leonard Dale C.B.E.When electricity was connected to the village he lost interest in the family milk business and decided that his future lay with the new industry.From a start wiring small cottages and farms the factory has become Britain's most consistent exporter of diesel-powered generating sets. The company employs three hundred staff,of which 60% are skilled,39% semi-skilled and 1% unskilled.It provides employment for Filey,Scarborough and Bridlington and the opportunity of training,further education and apprenticships,eight of which are offered in electro-mechanical engineering per year.There is also the possibility of the candidate continuing their studies at university under sponsorship.
